blockquote.p: The size of the state is r.

discussion.p: However, the next sentence specifies a total of r+1 items in the textual representation of the state, r specific x's as well as a specific carry. This makes a total of r+1 items that constitute the size of the state, rather than r.

resolution.p: We recommend the sentence be corrected to match:

blockquote.p: The size of the state is r+1.

resolution.note: Jens: I plead for "NAD" on the grounds that "size of state" is only used as an argument for big-O complexity notation, thus constant factors and additions don't count.
Berlin: N1932 adopts the proposed NAD.
